sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Container, Row, Col, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ChatTextFill, VolumeUpFill, GearFill, ArrowsFullscreen, } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import axios from "axios"; import "../AccountsAsset/Foot.css"; const endpoint = "https://bridgegatebackend.herokuapp.com"; export default function Foot() { const [currentDate] = useState(Date().toLocaleString()); const [support, setSupport] = useState(false); const [DPOEmail, setDPOEmail] = useState(""); const [DPOPhone, setDPOPhone] = useState(""); const [supportAddress, setsupportAddress] = useState(""); const [supportMail, setsupportMail] = useState(""); const [supportPhone, setsupportPhone] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const res = axios.get(`${endpoint}/api/site`); res.then((response) => { setDPOPhone(response.data.DPOPhone); setDPOEmail(response.data.DPOEmail); setsupportAddress(response.data.supportAddress); setsupportMail(response.data.supportMail); setsupportPhone(response.data.supportPhone); }); }, []); return (

Everyday, around the clock

{/* Sound}> Settings}> */}

Current Time: {currentDate}

{/* Switch to fullscreen mode}> */}
{support ? (
Contact Support
setSupport(false)}> {" "}
SUPPORT

EMAIL

{supportMail}

PHONE

{supportPhone}

ADDRESS

{supportAddress}

CONTACT DPO

EMAIL

{DPOEmail}

PHONE

{DPOPhone}

) : ( "" )}
); }
